csc143.sudoku

Class SudokuModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • csc143.sudoku.SudokuBase
        • csc143.sudoku.SudokuCore
          • csc143.sudoku.SudokuModel

  • public class SudokuModel
extends SudokuCore
    SudokuModel adds methods that evaluate the values in rows, columns, and regions to test for the proper state.
    Version:
    2015-07-19
    Author:
    Bob McHenry
